articles.description: Sherfane Rutherford hits a sublime unbeaten 68 as West Indies beat New Zealand by 13 runs to book their place in the T20 World Cup Super 8s.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: West Indies beat New Zealand to reach Super 8s

articles.description: BBC Sport TV and radio commentators pick the players they think could be the breakout stars of Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'The Next Modric', 'The Robot', 'Iceman' - 24 new players to watch

articles.description: India qualify for the T20 World Cup Super 8s despite being given a fright in a seven-wicket win over co-hosts USA.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: India beat USA in New York to qualify for Super 8s

articles.description: What next for Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag - transfers, his revised role, and is he still at risk next season?
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: What next for Man Utd manager - transfers, revised role, is he still at risk next season?

articles.description: Lionel Messi says he intends to finish his career with Inter Miami, but is not thinking about retiring just yet.
articles.title: Lionel Messi: Argentina forward intends to finish his career with Inter Miami - but not yet

articles.description: England coach Matthew Mott hopes Josh Hazlewood’s comments about possibly manipulating net run-rate to knock England out of the T20 World Cup were in jest.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England coach Matthew Mott hopes Josh Hazlewood comments were a joke

articles.description: FA chief executive Mark Bullingham on England boss Gareth Southgate's future and fan behaviour at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'No approaches' for England boss Gareth Southgate - FA chief Mark Bullingham

articles.description: Great Britain's Keely Hodgkinson successfully defends her 800m title with a dominant victory at the European Athletics Championships in Rome.
articles.title: European Athletics Championships 2024: Keely Hodgkinson defends 800m title

articles.description: In the eyes of many pundits, fans and even players, this week's US Open is Scottie Scheffler's to lose given his dominant start to 2024.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Rory McIlroy says Scottie Scheffler is guy to beat at Pinehurst

articles.description: Spaniards Carlos Alcaraz and Rafael Nadal will team up as doubles partners at the Olympic Games in Paris.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Carlos Alcaraz and Rafael Nadal to be doubles partners
